Calculate MF (mitigated fraction) with clustering and bootstrap options.
See http://goo.gl/pcXYVr for definition of MF. No endorsement, claim, or
warranty is implied for this package. It is made available for
investigational or pedagogical use only.

# Package index

## All functions

- [`HLBoot()`](https://abs-dev.github.io/MF/reference/HLBoot.md) :
  Bootstrap CI for MF, HL, and Qdif
- [`MFBoot()`](https://abs-dev.github.io/MF/reference/MFBoot.md) :
  Bootstrap MF CI
- [`MFClus()`](https://abs-dev.github.io/MF/reference/MFClus.md) :
  Clustered mitigated fraction
- [`MFClusBoot()`](https://abs-dev.github.io/MF/reference/MFClusBoot.md)
  : Bootstrap MF CI from clustered data
- [`MFClusBootHier()`](https://abs-dev.github.io/MF/reference/MFClusBootHier.md)
  : MFClusBootHier
- [`MFClusHier()`](https://abs-dev.github.io/MF/reference/MFClusHier.md)
  : MFClusHier
- [`MFSubj()`](https://abs-dev.github.io/MF/reference/MFSubj.md) :
  Subject components of mitigated fraction
- [`MFh()`](https://abs-dev.github.io/MF/reference/MFh.md) : Identify
  ranks for use when evaluating MF for nested hierarchy.
- [`MFhBoot()`](https://abs-dev.github.io/MF/reference/MFhBoot.md) :
  MFhBoot
- [`MFmp()`](https://abs-dev.github.io/MF/reference/MFmp.md) : Mitigated
  fraction from matched pairs
- [`MFnest()`](https://abs-dev.github.io/MF/reference/MFnest.md) :
  Summations to calculate the MF for nested data from a rank table.
- [`MFnestBoot()`](https://abs-dev.github.io/MF/reference/MFnestBoot.md)
  : MFnestBoot
- [`MFr()`](https://abs-dev.github.io/MF/reference/MFr.md) : Mitigated
  fraction
- [`calflung`](https://abs-dev.github.io/MF/reference/calflung.md)
  [`calflung-data`](https://abs-dev.github.io/MF/reference/calflung.md)
  : calflung dataset
- [`mf-class`](https://abs-dev.github.io/MF/reference/mf-class.md)
  [`mf`](https://abs-dev.github.io/MF/reference/mf-class.md) : Class mf
- [`mfboot-class`](https://abs-dev.github.io/MF/reference/mfboot-class.md)
  [`mfboot`](https://abs-dev.github.io/MF/reference/mfboot-class.md) :
  Class mfboot
- [`mfbootcluster-class`](https://abs-dev.github.io/MF/reference/mfbootcluster-class.md)
  [`mfbootcluster`](https://abs-dev.github.io/MF/reference/mfbootcluster-class.md)
  : Class mfbootcluster
- [`mfclusboothier-class`](https://abs-dev.github.io/MF/reference/mfclusboothier-class.md)
  [`mfclusboothier`](https://abs-dev.github.io/MF/reference/mfclusboothier-class.md)
  : Class mfclusboothier
- [`mfclushier-class`](https://abs-dev.github.io/MF/reference/mfclushier-class.md)
  [`mfclushier`](https://abs-dev.github.io/MF/reference/mfclushier-class.md)
  : Class mfclushier
- [`mfcluster-class`](https://abs-dev.github.io/MF/reference/mfcluster-class.md)
  [`mfcluster`](https://abs-dev.github.io/MF/reference/mfcluster-class.md)
  : Class mfcluster
- [`mfcomponents-class`](https://abs-dev.github.io/MF/reference/mfcomponents-class.md)
  [`mfcomponents`](https://abs-dev.github.io/MF/reference/mfcomponents-class.md)
  : Class mfcomponents
- [`mfhierdata-class`](https://abs-dev.github.io/MF/reference/mfhierdata-class.md)
  [`mfhierdata`](https://abs-dev.github.io/MF/reference/mfhierdata-class.md)
  : Class mfhierdata
- [`mfhlboot-class`](https://abs-dev.github.io/MF/reference/mfhlboot-class.md)
  [`mfhlboot`](https://abs-dev.github.io/MF/reference/mfhlboot-class.md)
  : Class mfhlboot
- [`mfmp-class`](https://abs-dev.github.io/MF/reference/mfmp-class.md)
  [`mfmp`](https://abs-dev.github.io/MF/reference/mfmp-class.md) : Class
  mfmp
- [`mlesions`](https://abs-dev.github.io/MF/reference/mlesions.md)
  [`mlesions-data`](https://abs-dev.github.io/MF/reference/mlesions.md)
  : mlesions dataset
- [`piglung`](https://abs-dev.github.io/MF/reference/piglung.md)
  [`piglung-data`](https://abs-dev.github.io/MF/reference/piglung.md) :
  piglung dataset
